about_the_game:
Dustmen is a 1-4 player co-op horror exploration game.

The Royal Decree

As a dustman, you've received orders to purify and remove clutter from deserted locations to halt the plague's advance.
Whether it's homes, estates, farms, or hospitals, the King will direct your efforts. Success brings the reward of precious gold coins, while failure leads to the guillotine's sharp edge.



Plague and Creatures

Gather your crew and journey in your horse-drawn wagon. Each forsaken site is now home to various creatures. As you sanitize these areas, be prepared to confront these monsters. Fear not, for as a dustman, you're equipped with everything you need: from mops and saltwater to sponges and beyond...

Features

- Immersive Experience: Realistic graphics from the Victorian Era.
- Co-op Multiplayer: Explore the world with a team of up to 4 players.
- Procedurally generated levels.
- Dangerous Creatures: 15+ different creatures, all with their unique powers.
- Changing Weather Conditions and Day/Night cycle.
- Proximity Voice Chat: Communicate with your teammates with proximity voice chat.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features a lifelike ambiance where characters controlled by players can meet their end in numerous ways, including dismemberment or beheading.

  • OS: 64-bit processor and operating system Windows 10

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Dustmen is a 1-4 player co-op horror exploration game. Set in plague times, the King has commanded you to sanitize and remove clutter from abandoned places to prevent the plague from spreading. Yet, be careful and keep an eye out for creatures around you.
